announcements.title: Scholarship Opportunity
announcements.description: We're excited to announce a special scholarship opportunity for our community! Every Thursday from 11:30 PM to 12:30 PM...
announcements.extraInfo: This is your chance to enhance your learning experience...
announcements.strongText: Mark your calendars and get ready to participate! Good luck!

steps.title: Starting the Weekly Contest
steps.description: To participate in the weekly contest, follow these steps:

list.title: Visit the Home Page
list.description: Navigate to the main page of our website.

list.title: Click on the Weekly Contest Card
Follow the Instructions
list.description: Once you click the card, you will be directed to the contest page...
